abilities.name: Aggressive.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

abilities.name: Corrupted Carrier.
abilities.description: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and any creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and becomes poisoned. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A creature poisoned by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. While poisoned by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

abilities.name: Nurtured One of Yurtrus.
abilities.description: The orc has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.
